DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether nutritional ( cholecalciferol ) active vitamin D ( calcitriol ) supplementation improve vascular endothelial function patient stage IIIB IV chronic kidney disease vitamin D insufficiency deficiency . The investigator hypothesize use calcitriol supplementation result improve vascular endothelial function compare cholecalciferol supplementation .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Arterial Function Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Age â‰¥ 18 year Chronic kidney disease stage IIIB IV 4 parameter Modified Diet Renal Diseases Formula ( Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate [ GFR ] 4415 ml/min/1.73m2 ) Vitamin D ( D2 + D3 ) deficient , define serum 25 ( OH ) D level < 30 ng/mL Corrected serum calcium < 10.2 mg/dL Serum phosphate < 4.6 mg/dL Serum albumin > 3.0 g/dL Body mass index < 40 kg/m2 Ability give inform consent Significant comorbid condition lead investigator conclude life expectancy le 1 year Expected undergo living relate kidney transplant next 6 month Pregnant , breastfeeding , unwilling use adequate birth control History severe liver disease Nephrotic range proteinuria ( > 3.5 gm/day ) Use active vitamin D analog within 30 day randomization
